name: Endurance with 15 Sprints"
description:
This session will help improve your endurance capacity and peak power efforts, with a climbing focus. Including 15 second maximal efforts throughout the ride, a mix of torque, power and cadence efforts. Carry out 4 x 9m45s minute blocks. With the 15 seconds coming after every 3 minutes. NOTE. This session is best completed with erg. mode turned OFF.
